text: Vin posmikhnuvsya ta smiyavsya z yiyi tverdzhennya, ta skazalo, "Miy Lord, bezposeredniy meni shchob buty appreciative blahoslovennya Vy podaruvaly meni ta moyi batʹky, ta shchob zrobyty spravedlyvi pratsi shcho budʹ laska Vy. Dopustitʹ meni Vashym myloserdyam u kompaniyu Vashykh spravedlyvykh sluzhbovtsiv
